dimensions: Warp x Weft: 161.5 x 61 cm (5 ft. 3 9/16 in. x 24 in.)
title: Carnegie's Dream
medium:
Medium: linen, wool, metallic thread
Technique: plain weave with continuous and discontinuous weft; some wrapping weft as in soumak technique
description: An image of the Carnegie Mansion at 2 East 91st Street as seen from the garden placed among clouds. When the hanging is in proper pictorial position, the warp is horizontal with selvages at top and bottom.
name: Hanging
